content: riverwild qiviuk scarf megan@delormedesigns ca www delormedesigns blogspot com delorme designs riverwild qiviuk scarf abbreviations dimensions approx- 5 x43 k-knit bobble- bind off p-purl sts- stitches yo-yarn over materials k2tog- knit 2 stitches together jacques cartier qiviuk- 1 skein repeat-repeat patt-pattern 50% qiviuk/ 50% mulberry silk ssk- slip 1st stitch knitwise from left 28grams 198m/217yds needle to right needle slip 2nd stitch colour 4009 purlwise from left needle onto right needle size 3 25mm needle insert tip of left needle into front of the 2 slipped gauge- lace weight stitches knit these 2 stitches together pattern cast on 40 sts knit 6 row garter stitch knit every row row 1 3 5 k4 ssk k3 yo k3 x4 k4 row2 and all ws row k3 p34 k3 row 7 9 11 k4 k3 yo k3 k2tog x4 k4 row 12 k3 p34 k3 repeat row 1-12 26 more times for a total of 27 times worked knit 6 row garter stitch knit every row bobble weave in ends block megan@delormedesigns ca www delormedesigns blogspot com delorme designs
